name: UNDISPUTED MMA
description:
A 3D MMA FIGHTING GAME CURRENTLY BEING DEVELOPED AND COMING SOON TO ANDROID AND WINDOWS.

DEMO V 15 WHAT'S NEW?
  • YOU CAN NOW PLAY CAREER MODE, KINDA.
  • SOUNDS! SOUNDS!! SOUNDS!!! - SFX, MUSIC AND CAMERA OPTIONS
  • A REFEREE
  • NEW HEALTH SYSTEM
  • SOME OTHER RANDOM FIXES
CONTROLS:

MOBILE

THERE ARE TOUCH CONTROLS FOR MOBILE DEVICES

KEYBOARD

W,A,S,D- FOR MOVEMENT

J- FOR PUNCHES

L- FOR KICKS

SHIFT- STRONG ATTACK MODIFIER(HOLD THE ATTACK BUTTON ON MOBILE DEVICES)

I- TO BLOCK

K- TO ATTEMPT A TAKEDOWN WHEN YOUR STAMINA (THE BLUE BAR) IS OVER 50%

M- FOR A SUBMISSION WHEN YOU'RE IN MOUNT POSITION

K- WHEN THE RED MARKER IS OVERLAPPING THE BLUE BAR TO SUCCESSFULLY PERFORM OR ESCAPE A TAKEDOWN ATTEMPT OR SUCCESSFULLY PERFORM A SUBMISSION

SOCIAL LINKS:

YOUTUBE

WHAT TO EXPECT:
  • CAREER MODE UPDATES
  • NEW ARENAS
  • GAMEPAD SUPPORT
  • MORE FIGHTERS AND WEIGHT CLASSES
AND IN THE FUTURE:
  • CHARACTER CREATION
  • I'LL EVENTUALLY GET AROUND TO MAKING AN IN GAME TUTORIAL. FOR NOW, THE CONTROLS ARE IN THE INSTRUCTIONS

YOU CAN PLAY OLDER VERSIONS HERE

ENJOY!
